::Zardus::

Zardus's growls silently, too quietly for anyone to hear. It would be against 
his best interests to kill off the maximals. He looks from Hell Beast to 
Megatron.

He glances at the slots in the cealing which contain the internal autoguns. 
He needed this treaty with the predacons, though, and killing them would not 
be the best way of acomplishing that.

"The best way of neutralizing an enemy is killing it. I don't think the 
newcomers would look very nicely on a treaty. From their preformance on the 
battlefield, they have proved that they could crush both of our factions... I 
suggest getting contacting the maximals.... Together, the three of us could 
crush these newcomers."
